name: Reckless Time Traveler Rewina
description:
You play as a time traveler who is hungry, you move with the arrow keys and rewind time with R, read the tutorial in the game for more info, this game has 2 enemies, 1 mini boss and 1 epic last boss who is related to the game jam. There are 3 levels and a Speedrun mode.

Credits for music:
Playful Forest Made by Tarush Singhal (Prod. Faccio)
Tower Defense Theme Made by DST
Dungeon Theme Made by Wanderer576
Great Boss Made by Spring Spring
